comment: He's very laid-back, tests are exactly like his study guides, likes to joke with the class.  Lectures are just like the so it can be boring.  He expects you to already understand the material.  He's very smart and likes to debate in class so if you speak up you'd better be able to defend your position.  He also works hard to show all points of view
Definitely knows his material. Tests are straight from the material covered in the study guide. Attendance is mandatory, but he allows you two unexcused absences. An A is possible if you study!

Great professor! Very straightforward examinations, makes class fun. Discussion posts are simple grades, and his term paper is not as daunting as it seems: just try your best to be impartial and non-biased (I received a 100% on it). He really values "getting all sides" on issues, and not appearing to take one side or another. Awesome prof!

Comparative politics is this professor's field and he is very knowledgeable about the subject matter. The course material is very detailed and can be hard to get into, if you're not interested. However, this professor does a great job explaining the finer points of comparative politics. Tests are not that difficult if you properly prepare for them

Intelligent and sexy..haha great combination. He is a professor that really wants his students to understand what he is teaching. Nothing is easy in this class, you must apply yourself and your knowledge. Duh its college. Such an interesting class. I would recommend him to anyone. We had a final paper and 4 tests,I never bought the book

I took him for Latin America: Democracy and Development, and International law. He is extremely helpful and actually wants his students to do well. Attendance is mandatory and he is fair on his grading methods.Wish I could take him again!

Very easy class! He does count for attendance, so don't miss too many days. As long as you study the powerpoint slides and read the small sections that he lists on the study guide, you will make an A. He also gives chances for extra credit. He wants you to make an A. Nothing is on the tests that isn't on the study guide. Take this class!

Amir is a great teacher and I would HIGHLY suggest choosing him for POLYSCI 1101 (a req. class for all undergrad degrees). He gives study guides a week before the test and posts all powerpoints online however he does take attendance, so I would go to class.

I love this teacher.  Taking him again.  Really wants the students to do well.  Honest and really funny-- reminds me of Paul Rudd. He's really fair and makes the class as enjoyable as he can.  Really wants students to succeed.

He really wants you to read the book before coming to class. His lectures will make a lot more sense if you do. He is good looking but the class itself is pretty boring. Attendance counts the same as a test grade and along with other little easy activities, pretty much guarantees you an A or a B. He was funny, take him!

Ughhh this class was killer boring... so if you can make yourself focus than I'm sure he is a great teacher. He is funny and nice in person, but in class make sure you dont talk or he will make you look like an idiot. Other than that make sure you attend class and you only have 4 tests... one of which you can drop.

Attendance part of your grade. Class itself is very boring. He posts study guides which is similar to the exam. Only drops lowest exam that's above a 50. Overall easy prof and would recommend him, but has an attitude problem and throws it at you if you talk to him one on one. Just don't talk to him personally and you'll be good.
Dr. Azarvan is extremely funny and easy to follow. The study guides are practically the tests. I would recommend for you to take this class.

Attendance is mandatory (20 percent of your grade). 4 Tests and you can drop the lowest if its above a 50. Test questions are straight from powerpoint notes and some from the book. Easy class if you go and look over notes.

He's a good teacher. Takes attendance daily~you can only miss 2 classes. Test are from lectures and readings in the book but he gives a study guide and sticks to pretty much exactly whats on it. Gives several opportunities for extra credit too.
He's so fine. Class was easy and not really that boring. Just STUDY for the tests which aren't that difficult.
overall, class is easy all lecture except movie day after test. Provides study guide , guide covers everyhting on the test, i failed the first but all A's after first test. Take Him!

He is really clear about the material, and gives a study guide that tells you what will be on the test. If you do the study guide you can pass the test. He takes attendance sometimes, by passing a list around. As long as you attend some and do the study guide you should pass. He's really hot and not boring.
